bill_title: provide for an interim study of the potential creation of a Department of Veterans Affairs as a cabinet-level department.
keywords: Department of Military and Veterans Affairs

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for an interim study of the potential creation of a Department of Veterans Affairs as a cabinet-level department. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council shall appoint an interim legislative committee to study the potential creation of a Department of Veterans Affairs as a cabinet-level department. The committee shall devote special attention to the following: (1) Are South Dakotan veterans, their dependents, and survivors receiving the benefits, entitlements, and services for which they are eligible; (2) Is the current Department of Military and Veterans Affairs addressing the needs of homeless veterans under the homeless veterans initiative program established pursuant to § 33-17-40; (3) What is the status of the East River veterans nursing facility study and the East River cemetery study which were to be conducted by the current Department of Military and Veterans Affairs; (4) Is a South Dakota military funeral honors program as authorized by the Department of Defense being implemented by the South Dakota Department of Military and Veterans Affairs; (5) A review of the current activities and programs of the Department of Military and Veterans Affairs relating to veterans and county veterans service officers; and (6) Other issues affecting South Dakota veterans and their families. The committee shall submit its findings, including legislative proposals and other recommendations, to the 2011 Legislature.
